797:1430: saṃśayāpagataṃ vastu yatra so'yaṃ bhramo mataḥ ||
797:1436: yena kenaci vaṇṇena bhāvo nāmāya mīrito || 331 ||
797:1439: nanu te yeva santāno sāgarā na kulā calā |
797:1440: manampi mariyādaṃ ye saṃvuṭṭhepi jahanti no ||
797:1441: na nu te eva santānaḥ sāgarā nakulā calāḥ |
797:1442: manasāpi ca maryyādāṃ ye saṃvṛṣṭe'i jahanti no ||
797:1446: aho gāḍhaṃ nimugge'i sukhayatyeva te jane || 334 ||
797:1451: madhū'va munino vācā na sampīṇotikaṃ janaṃ || 335 ||
797:1453: yathāmadhu munevaco na samprīṇanti kaṃ janam ||
797:1459: rasavantaṃ ti taṃ ñeyyaṃ rasavanta vidhāna to || 337 ||
797:1473: ko nāma passitumalaṃ khalu tā samantaṃ || 339 ||
797:1494: cittavutti visesā tu bhāvayanti rasā yato |
797:1502: rati hāso ca soko ca kodhussāhabhayaṃ i ca |
797:1507: ye te caranti sīlena te honti vyabhicāriṇo || 345 ||
797:1509: ye te caranti śīlena bhavanti vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
797:1522: thambha palaya romāñca tathā sedassu vepathu |
797:1525: vaivarṇya virvaratā bhāvā aṣṭaite hi sāttvikāḥ ||
797:1526: yadā ratyādayo bhāvā dhiti sīlā na honti ce |
797:1527: tadā savvepi te bhāvā bhavanti vyabhicāriṇo || 349 ||
797:1528: yadā ratyādayo bhāvā dhṛtiśīlā na bhavanti cet |
797:1529: tadā sarve'i te bhāvā bhavanti vyabhicāriṇāḥ ||
797:1531: yo siyā bodhakaṃ tesaṃ anubhāvo' yamīrito || 350 ||
797:1534: neka hetu manovutti visesaṃ ca vibhāvitu |
797:1538: sabibhāvānubhāvehi bhāvā te te yathā' rahaṃ |
797:1540: sa vibhāvānubhāvai hi mhāvaste te yathārham |
797:1566: yutyā bhāvānubhāvā te nibandhā posayanti naṃ |
797:1572: pamipose miyā hasmo bhiyyo tthippabhutīna mo || 360 ||
797:1576: paripoṣe syāddhāsyaḥ bhūyaḥ strī prabhṛtīnāṃ saḥ ||
797:1580: dve dve hassā kathitā cesaṃ jeṭṭhe majjhe jamme' i ca kamato ||
797:1586: dve dve hāsyāḥkathitāścaiṣāṃ jyeṣṭhe madhye kaniṣṭhe ca kramataḥ |
797:1620: bhāvādihi tudukkaso santo santa nise vito || 371 ||
